answerText: Elemental Odes[10] This poet wrote that "Jehovah parceled out the earth / to Coca Cola, Inc." in "The United Fruit Co." and also wrote the Elemental Odes and Canto General, which includes "The Heights of Machu Picchu."
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 4 | 4 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This group of poems includes one about "Conger Chowder" which states "that in this dish / you may know heaven." For 10 points each: [10] Name this group of works addressed to such objects as wine and tomatoes, which claims, "America, from a grain / of maize you grew."
